page.title: 06VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content: {A SURVEY OF THE VILLAGE} In our survey questionnaires were delivered to 182 houses in Alne, we received 60 replies. Questions asked were number of people in the houses,occupations,where they worked,how they travelled to work,type of education children were receiving opinions about the village,music, fashion,hobbies,beliefs and superstitions. In the survey sheets returned,we found that our survey is based upon the comments of 81 males and 89 females in the following age ranges:- Age range Males Females Under 5 5 3 5-11 16 8 11-18 7 18 18-40 20 28 41-65 24 23 Over 65 9 9
